comments:
Hi,

I am using Eclipse RC2 with compatible CDT on Windows XP.

Have other utilities like Java,Zip and Unzip installed properly.

When I ran the Automated test suites for CDT-Debug(the test plugin 
org.eclipse.cdt.debug.ui.test to be more precise) testing the Debug UI 
functionality, I am getting the following Zip Exceptions.

--- have pasted the exception for your reference----------------------------

This particular problem is fixed, reassigning to Mikhail for further verification.
*** Bug 69138 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
PR was not targeted to any particular release. Changing target milestone to 2.1
We will work on Junit test for the debugger in cdt-3.0

I believe this is fix in the head.
